articles.title: Leinster boss Leo Cullen hits out at EPCR over 'illogical' approach - Independent.ie
articles.description: Leinster head coach Leo Cullen has blasted Heineken Champions Cup organisers European Professional Club Rugby (EPCR) for what he believes is an “illogical” approach to settling called-off matches.

articles.title: Covid jabs may lead to ‘very rare’ spinal cord inflammation, says EU’s drug watchdog - WION
articles.description: The European Union’s (EU) drug watchdog is looking to warn general public about a ‘very rare’ possibility of leading to spinal cord inflammation after getting vaccinated with coronavirus vaccines manufactured by AstraZeneca and Johnson & Johnson.

articles.title: Omicron could make booster doses counterproductive, EMA suggests - MercoPress
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency (EMA) has ventured this week that repeated booster doses of vaccine risked overloading people's immune systems and was not a sustainable strategy.
